name: Merge Ant: Insect Fusion
description:
Gameplay is straightforward; decide who will fight for you to win the game. Want to get stronger? Use strategy and merge identical insect soldiers.

Merge ants and fight against enemies with your wits! Control the merge arena!
Merge Ant: Insect Fusion is a real-time strategy game. You need to merge your ants to create more robust ants to defeat your enemies.

The mechanic is simple: summon ants on the battlefield to fight the enemies using your tactics. You must merge your ants into powerful monsters to beat the crap out of your opponents. The higher the monster's level, the stronger the attack and defense. Appropriate placement of ants with different attributes can help you win quickly and move to the next level fast.

How to Play
- Merge your troops to grow your powers
- Quickly synthesize your ants into giant monsters
- React and think quickly; otherwise, the enemies will crush you
- Choose the right combination and defeat the most vigorous opponent

Key Features
- Free to play this real-time merge game.
- Addictive gameplay and 3D graphs.
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- This game is perfect for insect lovers.
